snippet: The playwrights are the 2012 recipients of the Horton Foote Prize, a biennial award named for the playwright and screenwriter.
abstract: The playwrights are the 2012 recipients of the Horton Foote Prize, a biennial award named for the playwright and screenwriter.

headline.main: David Lindsay-Abaire and Naomi Wallace Receive Horton Foote Prize
headline.print_headline: Two Playwrights Receive Horton Foote Prize
